hero.hero_details: Deelance is a freelancing and Recruitment platform based on Web3. Deelance is one such decentralized platform that is redefining how freelancers connect with potential employers and buyers

cards.title: Business Simplified
cards.description: Post a job or apply for one in a minute.No browser plugins, 3rd party apps, credit card details, or wallet-linking necessary. Fast, efficient & easy the way blockchain is meant to be

cards.title: Transparency
cards.description: By implementing an automated dispute system and reputation stored on the blockchain. we’re building a trustworthy platform all stakeholders can rely on.

cards.title: Escrow
cards.description: With escrow, Freelancers have the guarantee of payment for their services, while the Employer’s funds are safe until the Freelancer produces the expected work. As it’s based on smart contracts.

cards.title: Ownership
cards.description: With NFT (NFT) get ownership of the underlying asset or piece of work. NFTs can represent: art, music, photographs, designs, web pages, animations, videos, royalty or copyright of work etc.

cards.title: Low Fees
cards.description: Our decentralized and reputation stored on the blockchain. freelance market ecosystem alower fees by directly connecting Employers and Freelancers.

cards.title: Fast Payments
cards.description: You can use Crypto get paid for your services quickly and avoid currency exchange and possible commission rates

about_us.description: Deelance is a freelancing and Recruitment platform based on Web3. Deelance is one such decentralized platform that is redefining how freelancers connect with potential employers and buyers.

points.title: Fully Decentralized
points.description: World’s first fully decentralized freelance network

points.title: 2% Commission
points.description: Only 2% Commission lowest In the Industry

points.title: Instant Withdrawal
points.description: Unlimited ownership Instant Withdrawal recruitment platform

find_freelancer.title: Find Freelancer In
find_freelancer.description_1: Deelance ” is a project that creates unique contents on Metaverse technology that is a huge trend around the world. Its aim is to move people to another dimension within the digital universe.
find_freelancer.description_2: Metaverse - where buyers can interact with freelancers in the office space and have a discussion

warning: Cryptocurrency may be unregulated in your jurisdiction. The value of cryptocurrencies may go down as well as up. Profits may be subject to capital gains or other taxes applicable in your jurisdiction.

footer.title: Deelance is a freelancing and Recruitment platform based on Web3 platform that is redefining how freelancers connect with potential employers and buyers.
